headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BROWN, ROSCOE C.

snippet: BROWN--Roscoe C.,Jr. The Graduate Center, CUNY, deeply mourns the loss of Dr. Roscoe C. Brown, Jr., whose devotion to country, community, and public service inspired all who knew him. After serving as president of Bronx Community College, Dr. Brow...
lead_paragraph: BROWN--Roscoe C.,Jr. The Graduate Center, CUNY, deeply mourns the loss of Dr. Roscoe C. Brown, Jr., whose devotion to country, community, and public service inspired all who knew him. After serving as president of Bronx Community College, Dr. Brown found his academic home at the Graduate Center, leading the Center for Urban Education Policy with his characteristic vigor and passion. His was a life of uncommon courage and integrity, and we join our CUNY colleagues in extending our deepest condolences to his family and friends. Chase F. Robinson, President, The Graduate Center 1/3
